string-array.name: array_draw_outcome
string-array.item: Well done for drawing with the BOT! Hard to beat the machine!
Well done for drawing with the BOT! You are a machine!
Well well someone seems to be as smart as the BOT!
You think that you are clever, don\'t you?
You can\'t keep up with the BOT forever! But well done for fighting!

string-array.name: array_lost_outcome
string-array.item: PANTS! This is harder than it looks!
PANTS! This game of recall is hard!
PANTS! The Bot wins! Got to try harder than that!

string-array.name: array_time_over_outcome
string-array.item: Time waits for no one! PANTS!
If only you had a few seconds more! PANTS!
Get those fingers typing faster slow coach!
Seriously? I thought you could do better than that!
Get a move on slow poke!
